labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The message\_id of the message in which the role was mentioned is copied to your clipboard
data.expected_result: Selecting "Copy ID" when right clicking a role mention should copy the role\_id to your clipboard
data.short_description: Right click -> Copy ID on a role mention copies the message_id instead of the role_id
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable developer mode - Mention a role in a chat channel with some text - Right click on the role mention and select "Copy ID" - Paste the copied text - Right click on the other text and select Copy ID - Paste the copied text (they are the same)
